entry.title: Community Building around the Digital Humanities

link.title: Community Building around the Digital Humanities

entry.content:
Community Building around DH

I’m excited to share with y’all that I will be talking about the Digital South process and our efforts around community building at the Digital Library Federation Forum on October 12th!

entry.title: Digital South Fall Panel Series

entry.title: Welcome to the Digital South Website!

link.title: Welcome to the Digital South Website!

entry.content:
